extendedInfo.description: LockPattern OnOff is a simple widget (1Ã1), which allows you quickly activate a lock screen pattern.RE ADD WIDGET AFTER UPDATE!!!API on 2.2 is closed now!IF YOUR PATTERN IS EMPTY:To setup or change patten: Setings->Security&location->Change unclock pattern

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Very cool app. Works great, easy, and multiple security options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bummer
reviews.comment: Sad that this isn\'t a toggle & only a shortcut to your phone\'s lock settings. Although, I\'m sort of surprised Android doesn\'t have a toggle built-in.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The pattetn lock didn\'t work until after I uninstalled this. Now I\'m stuck with the same pattern lock :/ droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Used to work perfectly before i updated my phone to 2.2 Now to activate lock pattern, i have to set a new one every time! Please fix. MILESTONE\342\204\242 2.2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was such a simple and useful app before 2.2 - now its just a shortcut to security rather than a lock toggle. Please fix for froyo!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is uninstalled on my phone but it still shows up! I want to get rid of it!! Dont install!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: It wouldn\'t even lock my screen. Could set the pattern but it was for nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Being able to toggle my lock pattern off & on from the widget would be nice, but I\'m ok with it taking me to the lock settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why are you not able to turn it off or on anymore?? This app sucks now!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Spend the money download tasker... works great you can make it toggle security lock, screen lock, or both.. and it\'ll work with passcode/word
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Didnt work to lock, just press unlock button long enough and you are in without any pattern needed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Mine isnt working. Liked the old version with the on/off option WAY better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Before 2.2 you needed only one click to enable/ disable lockpattern. Must get that functionality back. Now must re-entern pattern every time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was fine until update. Droid 2.2 those who have old version should share it with us via bump app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works fine on my t mobile g2, I recognized the lock pattern, a friend at work uses it too
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Works for me. One suggestion is to make an option to toggle.  To input your primary password and just press the widget to automatically turn it on/off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very easy to use and customize and I love the added security and peace of mind.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recommended
reviews.comment: Not much need be said. This app works well, just like pretty much everything else I\'ve used that was designed by this dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice,but missing the sound on/off opt in the locked screen and I wish it were an app shown in the drawer rather than just a widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Advertises on off toggle. No toggle. Worked great on 2.1. Now it simply sucks @$$
reviews.author: A Google User
